original: gnon zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa slu ba'i sems can no //
analyzed: gnon zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa slu ba'i sems can no //
translated: The oppressed are those sentient beings who deceive the guru, the Buddha, and so forth.

original: lan cig bltas pa'i zhes bya ba ni dus gcig tu bcos pa'i khro bos nges par gnon par 'gyur zhing snying rjes dmyal ba las 'don pa'i bsam pas kha sbyor dang sngags kyis kyang slu ba po gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan cig bltas pa'i zhes bya ba ni dus gcig tu bcos pa'i khro bos nges par gnon par 'gyur zhing snying rjes dmyal ba las 'don pa'i bsam pas kha sbyor dang sngags kyis kyang slu ba po gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The once-seen are those who, in one moment, are definitely oppressed by the anger of the creator, and are killed by the mantra of the union of the compassionate one who has the intention to liberate from hell.

original: bltas zhes bya ba la gang cung zad dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i skyes pa'am bud med kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bltas zhes bya ba la gang cung zad dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i skyes pa'am bud med kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The seen are those men and women who have generated any roots of virtue whatsoever.

original: de ni rnal 'byor @217b ba mthong btsam gyis tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i so so'i bdag nyid rig pa'i yi shes kyis sa ra ha'i zhabs bzhin du de nyid spros pa med pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor @217b ba mthong btsam gyis tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i so so'i bdag nyid rig pa'i yi shes kyis sa ra ha'i zhabs bzhin du de nyid spros pa med pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes
translated: The mere seeing is the mere seeing of the yogi. By the mere seeing of the yogi, they become yogis themselves, through the method of practicing the conduct of reality without conceptual elaborations, like the venerable Saraha, with the knowledge of the individual nature that is not the domain of words.

original: bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de ltar re zhig dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu gsal bar byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu gsal bar byas nas /

original: dbang ma bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pas stong par bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /

original: ma mthong bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma mthong bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: ji ltar mi bden pa'i smig rgyu dang / nam mkha' la 'thung ba dang brdeg pa mi rigs pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar lha'i rnal 'byor ba dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa nyid du mi rigs so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar mi bden pa'i smig rgyu dang / nam mkha' la 'thung ba dang brdeg pa mi rigs pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar lha'i rnal 'byor ba dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa nyid du mi rigs so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Just as it is unreasonable to drink the sky and to beat an illusory mirage, in the same way, it is unreasonable to be a yogi of the deity and a yogi of the mantra without seeing the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gang las shen /
analyzed: gang las shen /
translated: From what?

original: gsungs pa / rnal 'byor 'di ni mngon mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gsungs pa / rnal 'byor 'di ni mngon mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pas mchog go //

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pa gang la la zhig go //

original: de ni lha mi dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sems can de rnams kyis bdag po zil gyis man na nas mthu stobs las shin tu 'das nas 'gro bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: de dang lhan cig tu rol par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: Here and so forth: the person who has obtained initiation in this Cakrasa·πÉvara ma·πá·∏çala will accomplish pacification and so forth taught in other tantras, it is thought.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /

original: gsungs pa sbas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang gi phyir 'dir dbang bskur thob pas bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor bla @218a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa sbas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / gang gi phyir 'dir dbang bskur thob pas bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor bla @218a * //

analyzed: na med pa dang / rgyud gzhan rnams kyi yang thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: 'dir rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: gsungs pa de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: bde mchog dang zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i mngon par brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Cakrasa·πÉvara‚Äù is the explanatory tantra Equal to the Sky.

original: 'di zhes pa ni gang gi phyir dpal bde mchog gi bdag nyid ma byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pas che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa de'i phyir 'di yang rnal 'byor bla na med pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni gang gi phyir dpal bde mchog gi bdag nyid ma byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pas che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa de'i phyir 'di yang rnal 'byor bla na med pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù is the very glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara, which is not arisen and will not arise. Since it is taught that the nature of greatness is not arisen, the intended meaning is that this is also the highest yoga.

original: da ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga kun rdzogs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga kun rdzogs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: bstan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äúteaching‚Äù and so forth.

original: bstan dang zhes pa ni de yang chu dang ba'i lci ba la sogs pa'i rjes su bstan to //
analyzed: bstan dang zhes pa ni de yang chu dang ba'i lci ba la sogs pa'i rjes su bstan to //
translated: ‚Äú Teaching‚Äù is also taught by the subsequent explanation of the cow‚Äôs urine and so forth.

original: ma bstan pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bshad pa'i gang zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi 'dus byas la sogs pa de gnyi gas kyang /
analyzed: ma bstan pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bshad pa'i gang zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi 'dus byas la sogs pa de gnyi gas kyang /
translated: The unexpressed is all the Yoginƒ´ Tantras and the explanations in the Yoga Tantras, which are both of the nature of the mandala ground, and so forth.

original: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa gnas shing thams cad nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa gnas shing thams cad nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The glorious Heruka yogi/nƒ´ abides in all of them, and all of them are blessed by him.

original: de de ltar na gsungs pa dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de de ltar na gsungs pa dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said, ‚Äúthe glorious Heruka yogi/nƒ´‚Äù and so forth.

original: rim par phye ba gsum pa'o /
analyzed: rim par phye ba gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third chapter on the sequence.

original: // /'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i zhes pa ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo gsum bkod pa'i go rims las bzlog nas bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: // /'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i zhes pa ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo gsum bkod pa'i go rims las bzlog nas bstan pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúResiding in the three wheels‚Äù is taught in reverse order from the arrangement of the three wheels in the drawn mandala.

original: slob dpon med par 'jug par ma gyur cig snyam pas 'khor lo dgod pa de'i mthar thug par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus chen po dang por brjod nas 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la thug pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad go rims las bzlog pa bstan te /
analyzed: slob dpon med par 'jug par ma gyur cig snyam pas 'khor lo dgod pa de'i mthar thug par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus chen po dang por brjod nas 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la thug pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad go rims las bzlog pa bstan te /
translated: and ending with Cakravega are taught in reverse order, after first mentioning the great effort that is the culmination of the setting of the wheel, with the thought May I not enter without a master.

original: de bzhin du bya gdong ma la sogs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor brgyad po yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du bya gdong ma la sogs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor brgyad po yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, the eight speech mandalas beginning with HayakarüîΩna are also [taught].

original: 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin //

original: zhes pa ni sngar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor lo 'di rnams dgong pa yin par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor lo 'di rnams dgong pa yin par dgongs pa'o //

original: de bzhin du dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig par bcom ldan 'das dgong pa ni shugs kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig par bcom ldan 'das dgong pa ni shugs kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni //
translated: Because of the teaching of Om and so forth.

original: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
translated: Because of the teaching of One should recite one's own name mantra,

original: zhes pa'i rjes thogs su bstan pa'i phyir na de'i 'og tu 'di nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i rjes thogs su bstan pa'i phyir na de'i 'og tu 'di nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //

original: 'di ltar bstan te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bstan te /

original: mthong na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis 'khor lo gsum gyi gtso bo rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid du rig par 'gyur ro //

translated: Seeing and so forth: by this, one should know the greatness of the yogi/nƒ´ who is endowed with the yoga of the principal of the three wheels.

original: rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o /

original: // / rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i don du rim par phye ba lnga pa gsungs pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: // / rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i don du rim par phye ba lnga pa gsungs pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //

original: de nas ni rim par phye ba bzhi pa bshad pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas ni rim par phye ba bzhi pa bshad pa'i rjes thogs su'o //

original: chos 'byung zhes pa ni chos thams cad stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: shing las 'dzegs pa de bzhin du gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa ste /
translated: Just as with climbing a tree, one can go to a place or a nearby place, and so forth.

original: slar 'ongs nas 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar 'ongs nas 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having returned, one will gather.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams kyis sngags gzhan gyi mthu stobs 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams kyis sngags gzhan gyi mthu stobs 'phrog par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin du sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'phrog par byed do //

analyzed: khrag ces bya ba la sogs pas ni bstan pa la gnod pa slar mi byed pa'i rgyur khrag 'gugs par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúBlood‚Äù and so forth means that one can summon blood as a cause for not harming the teachings again.

analyzed: slar gtong bar byed do zhes pa ni bkug pa ltar de bzhin du rab tu 'jog par byed do //
translated: And again, one should send forth means that, just as one summons, in the same way one should establish.

analyzed: gzugs brgya stong phrag la sogs pa ni dka' 'grel las bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //

analyzed: cho ga de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags kyi nus pas las thams cad nus pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //

original: de bzhin du bstan ma thag pa'i rim pas phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa'i cho ga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sgrub pa po sa thams cad 'grub par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du bstan ma thag pa'i rim pas phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa'i cho ga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sgrub pa po sa thams cad 'grub par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: In the same way, the adept who is endowed with the rite of recitation with the mantra of the rosary, by the process just taught, accomplishes everything. This is the meaning.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach just that, he says:

original: dran pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: dran pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: mindfulness and so on, which is easy to understand.üîΩ üîΩThe mantra of the rosary is the mantra of the rosary.

analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsgrub bya gang gi ming rten la phreng ba'i sngags lan cig bzlas pas de dang de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of whose and so forth is that by reciting the garland mantra once for the name of the one to be accomplished, he will die at that very moment.

original: 'di la zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: 'di la zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
translated: This refers to the garland mantra.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bde mchog 'khor lo'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bde mchog 'khor lo'i bdag nyid de /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is the nature of Cakrasa·πÉvara,

translated: because the mantra and deity are non-different.

analyzed: de lta bas na de ni mi sbyar ro //

translated: Without discipline and so forth means with desire, it is thought.

analyzed: de lta na gsungs pa / 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus it is said:üîΩThis [mantra] is the best of all mantras, and so forth.

analyzed: rtogs pa'i cho gas 'dis zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags @225a * //üîΩbzlas pas so //
translated: By this method of realization refers to the garland mantra.üîΩReciting means reciting the garland mantra.

translated: The one who, having understood the mantra garland, practices, for that adept the mantra and the mudra immediately taught bestow the other accomplishments, such as the food, drink, etc.

original: 'gyur ro // sngags dang phyag rgya drug pa'i don gyi dang por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // sngags dang phyag rgya drug pa'i don gyi dang por rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the six mudras and mantras should be known first.

original: rim pa bye ba dgu ba'o /
analyzed: rim pa bye ba dgu ba'o /
translated: The nine million steps

original: // / sku gsum bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / sku gsum bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the three bodies, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: ji ltar bshad pa yin pa de rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa yin pa de rnams gsungs pa /
translated: [He] declares those that are explained:

original: he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo dang tha mi dad par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo dang tha mi dad par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By heruka, etc., [he] means not different from glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara.

original: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub thabs nas bshad pa rim pas gang gi tshe chos kyi sku bsgom pa de'i tshe long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bsgom pa dang sprul pa'i sku bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub thabs nas bshad pa rim pas gang gi tshe chos kyi sku bsgom pa de'i tshe long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bsgom pa dang sprul pa'i sku bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe Dharma‚Äù and so forth, explained in the Means of Achievement, is that when one meditates on the Dharma Body, then one should meditate on the Enjoyment Body and the Emanation Body.

original: don 'di nyid kyi rim pas dga' 'grel las gsal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: don 'di nyid kyi rim pas dga' 'grel las gsal bar byas pa'o //
translated: This very meaning is clarified in the Heruka Galpo.

original: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa 'dis ci sku gsum bsgom par bya'o zhe na //
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa 'dis ci sku gsum bsgom par bya'o zhe na //
translated: ‚Äú One‚Äù and so forth, by this [verse] one should meditate on the three bodies.

original: gsungs pa / ye shes kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / ye shes kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúby the wisdom‚Äù and so forth.

original: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to clarify this very meaning, it is said:

original: he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal he ru ka bdag nyid kyi gzugs su sgrub pa pos 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal he ru ka bdag nyid kyi gzugs su sgrub pa pos 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe glorious Heruka‚Äù and so forth. The adept will be accomplished in the form of the glorious Heruka. This is the intention.

original: tshig 'phrog ces pa ni bstan pa la gnod pa gang la la zhig de ni ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur bas snying rjes bcings pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis de las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir rim par phye ba brgyad pa las gsungs pa'i snying po'i sngags nyon
analyzed: tshig 'phrog ces pa ni bstan pa la gnod pa gang la la zhig de ni ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur bas snying rjes bcings pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis de las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir rim par phye ba brgyad pa las gsungs pa'i snying po'i sngags nyon
translated: The stealing of speech is the speech of one who is bound by compassion, in order to turn away from that one who would harm the teaching, who would fall into the lower realms.

original: mongs par byas pa'i sngags las sngags bzlog pa tsam gyis tshig la sogs pa'i 'dod pas 'jigs par byed do //
analyzed: mongs par byas pa'i sngags las sngags bzlog pa tsam gyis tshig la sogs pa'i 'dod pas 'jigs par byed do //
translated: The mantra of the essence taught in the eighth chapter, by merely reversing the mantra of the afflicted, one frightens with the desire for speech and so forth.

original: de'i bzlog pa 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bzlog pa 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: This reversal of that is the illustration.

original: de bzhin du so sor 'gugs par byed do zhes go bar bya'o zhes pa ni rim par phye ba bcu pa'o /
analyzed: de bzhin du so sor 'gugs par byed do zhes go bar bya'o zhes pa ni rim par phye ba bcu pa'o /
translated: One should understand that one should summon individually in the same way. This is the tenth chapter.

original: // / de'i sna nyid dang zhes pa ni de'i dri zhim po can gyi dri'i sgo nas sna'i rnam shes pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: // / de'i sna nyid dang zhes pa ni de'i dri zhim po can gyi dri'i sgo nas sna'i rnam shes pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
translated: The nose of that is the discrimination of the nose consciousness through the smell of its sweet scent.

original: 'dis kyang nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig gis gzhan mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang yongs su gcod pa'o zhes so sor bya'o @225b rim par phye ba bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dis kyang nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig gis gzhan mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang yongs su gcod pa'o zhes so sor bya'o @225b rim par phye ba bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las gsungs pa /
translated: This also is a word that illustrates the other, the eye consciousness and so on, which are also delimiting.üîΩüîΩThe 49th chapter of the Pramanavarttika says:üîΩ

original: de ni rim par phye ba 'di las gsungs pa yang mig mi 'dzums pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: de ni rim par phye ba 'di las gsungs pa yang mig mi 'dzums pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: This also is an example, and one should understand that the others, such as the eye consciousness, are also delimiting.

original: rim par phye ba bcu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: rim par phye ba bcu gcig pa'o /
translated: It is said in the forty-ninth chapter:üîΩ‚ÄúIt is the object of the eye consciousness, etc., which have the characteristic of the open eye, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThe eleventh chapter is called ‚ÄúThe Water of the Dead Hero.‚Äù

original: // / dpa' bo shi ba'i chu zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog gi 'khor lo sgom par byed pa yon tan lhag pa can shi ba de ni dpa' bo shi ba'o //
analyzed: // / dpa' bo shi ba'i chu zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog gi 'khor lo sgom par byed pa yon tan lhag pa can shi ba de ni dpa' bo shi ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúdead hero‚Äù is the one who has died, who has the excellence of meditation on the glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara.

original: mi'i khrag ces pa ni ji snyed pas so //
analyzed: mi'i khrag ces pa ni ji snyed pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúHuman blood‚Äù is as much as is needed.

original: btags la nang du lig bu mig bcug la zhes pa ni lig bu mig ni rdo'i bye brag go //
analyzed: btags la nang du lig bu mig bcug la zhes pa ni lig bu mig ni rdo'i bye brag go //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving inserted antimony inside the label‚Äù means that antimony is a type of stone.

original: gzhug pa ni de yis ri lu byas te zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhug pa ni de yis ri lu byas te zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúInsert‚Äù means that one makes a pill with it.

original: lcags gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gser dang dngul dang zangs rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du man cha gsum dang phye dang brgyad /
analyzed: lcags gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gser dang dngul dang zangs rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du man cha gsum dang phye dang brgyad /
translated: The three metals and so forth are gold, silver, and copper, which are respectively three, eight, and four parts.

original: de bzhin bzhi dang phye dang brgyad dang gsum //
analyzed: de bzhin bzhi dang phye dang brgyad dang gsum //
translated: Likewise, four and eight parts, and three.

original: man cha gsum dang ra ri lngas //
analyzed: man cha gsum dang ra ri lngas //
translated: With three parts and five lines,

original: ri lu nges par bcing bar bya //
analyzed: ri lu nges par bcing bar bya //
translated: the pill should be bound.

original: zhes pa'i gzhung gi sgo nas tshad nges pas byang bu gsum gyis rim pas lu gtum par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i gzhung gi sgo nas tshad nges pas byang bu gsum gyis rim pas lu gtum par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that the size is definite by way of the text, and the three plates are to be gradually ground into a pill.

original: yang lhag par gnas par yas la zhes pa ni bstan ma thag pa'i lcags gsum du gtums pa'i ri lu lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rab gnas bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yang lhag par gnas par yas la zhes pa ni bstan ma thag pa'i lcags gsum du gtums pa'i ri lu lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rab gnas bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Also, the intention is that the pill wrapped in the three metals just explained is to be consecrated in the mandala of colored powder, preceded by the preliminary of consecration and so forth.

original: skar ma rgyal la bab na zhes pa ni skar ma rgyal la'o /'am gyis sgras 'dir dge ba'i rgyu skar thams cad la bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: skar ma rgyal la bab na zhes pa ni skar ma rgyal la'o /'am gyis sgras 'dir dge ba'i rgyu skar thams cad la bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa'o //
translated: The phrase when the star Pushya is ascendant means when the star Pushya is ascendant, and the word or is meant to include all the auspicious stars, as the Lord intended.üîΩThe phrase the glorious Heruka means the one whose nature is endowed with the yoga of the glorious Cakrasamvara, as the Lord intended.

original: dpal he ru ka bya ba ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ces dgongs pa'o / rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka bya ba ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ces dgongs pa'o / rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The phrase endowed with the yoga of Vajrabhairava means the one who is a yogi of the glorious Cakrasamvara.

original: gnas lnga zhes pa ni mgo dang mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i gnas rnams so //
analyzed: gnas lnga zhes pa ni mgo dang mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i gnas rnams so //
translated: The phrase five places means the head, throat, heart, navel, and secret place.

original: yi ge re re zhing yang bzlas brjod 'bum zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge re re zhing yang bzlas brjod 'bum zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The phrase one hundred thousand recitations for each syllable means one hundred thousand recitations of the essence mantra, as the Lord intended.

original: cho ga dang rjes su mthun pa zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cho ga dang rjes su mthun pa zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase in accordance with the rite means the procedure that will be taught in the thirty-five chapters.

original: sems can gang rjes su dran pa zhes bya ni srog chags gang gi gzugs su byed par 'dod pas blta zhing der rnam par bsam mo @226a * //
analyzed: sems can gang rjes su dran pa zhes bya ni srog chags gang gi gzugs su byed par 'dod pas blta zhing der rnam par bsam mo @226a * //
translated: The phrase the sentient being who is to be remembered means the form of the living being that one wishes to make, and one should look at it and think of it.

original: zhes pa'o // thod pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas nyi ma phyed kyi dus tshod la lag pa g-yon pas thod pa'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // thod pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas nyi ma phyed kyi dus tshod la lag pa g-yon pas thod pa'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
translated: The phrase the skull-cup gesture means that the mantrin who is endowed with the deity yoga, at the time of midday, binds the gesture in the form of a skull-cup with the left hand,

original: g-yas pas rdo rje'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyor du snying gar byas te /üîΩspyi gtsug grol ba /
analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rje'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyor du snying gar byas te / spyi gtsug grol ba /
translated: and with the right hand the gesture in the form of a vajra, and places them together at the heart.

original: g-yon brkyang bas kun du bzlas pa bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang bas kun du bzlas pa bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
translated: The phrase with the head unbound means that one should recite the mantra with the right leg extended. This is the esoteric instruction.

original: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the twelfth chapter.

original: // / da ni go cha'i sngags kyis kyang las bya bar 'dod pas rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni go cha'i sngags kyis kyang las bya bar 'dod pas rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, one who wishes to perform the rites with the armor mantra should recite the thirteenth chapter.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: go cha zhes pa ni go cha'i sngags gnyis khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: go cha zhes pa ni go cha'i sngags gnyis khyad par med pa'o //
translated: Armor is the two armor mantras, without distinction.

original: mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgrub pa po de tshom rkun la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgrub pa po de tshom rkun la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to /
translated: One becomes invisible means that the adept will not be seen by thieves, etc.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang skyob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang skyob bo //
translated: Likewise, he is also protected.

original: ras byas zhes pa la sogs pa ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i rim pa zhes lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ras byas zhes pa la sogs pa ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i rim pa zhes lhag ma'o //
translated: Made of cloth, etc. means that the procedure is taught in another tantra.

original: las 'di dag thams cad ji ltar bya ba la sogs pa de nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: las 'di dag thams cad ji ltar bya ba la sogs pa de nas gsungs pa /
translated: Then, etc.

original: gang dang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i las rnams dbang po'i spyod yul du 'gro ste /
analyzed: gang dang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i las rnams dbang po'i spyod yul du 'gro ste /
translated: Whatever, etc. means that whatever of the previously taught rites goes into the range of the senses,

original: yid kyi dbang po'i yul du de 'gro bas mngon par 'dod par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po'i yul du de 'gro bas mngon par 'dod par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: since it goes into the range of the mental faculty, it should be made manifest, means the sense.

original: de dang zhes pa ni de dang der 'di thams cad bya'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes pa ni de dang der 'di thams cad bya'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: And that means and that and that, all this is to be done, is the remainder.

original: mchog tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: mchog tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the application of supreme equipoise.

original: zhes pa ni shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: It is the nature of the mind that is extremely equipoised.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gyur pa ni don dam par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal bde mchog thob par 'dod pas lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas las thams cad bya ba yin par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gyur pa ni don dam par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal bde mchog thob par 'dod pas lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas las thams cad bya ba yin par dgongs pa'o //
translated: Having attained the nature of all the Buddhas, one who desires to attain the nature of glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara, which is ultimately the nature of all the Buddhas, should perform all the rites with the yoga of the deity as the preliminary. This is the intention.

original: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o /
translated: These are the thirteen chapters.

original: // / de nas sgrub thabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis 'grub par byed pas na sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: // / de nas sgrub thabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis 'grub par byed pas na sgrub thabs so //
translated: Now, beginning with the one called the means of accomplishment, it is a means of accomplishment because it accomplishes.

original: de'i sgrub thabs ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i sgrub thabs ci zhe na /
translated: What is the means of that?

original: gsungs pa / bong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / bong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said: the donkey, etc.

original: ci'i don du rnal 'byor 'di bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du rnal 'byor 'di bya zhe na /
translated: For what purpose is this yoga to be done?

original: gsungs pa / yid kyi shugs kyis ni bzlog par bya ba'i phyir bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shugs kyis bzlog ste //
analyzed: gsungs pa / yid kyi shugs kyis ni bzlog par bya ba'i phyir bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shugs kyis bzlog ste //
translated: In order to turn back the force of the mind, one turns back with the force of the yoga of the donkey form.

original: 'khor ba las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de'i don du zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor ba las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de'i don du zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Having turned back from sa·πÉsƒÅra, one should attain buddhahood. This is the meaning of ‚Äúfor that purpose.‚Äù

original: ci bcom ldan 'das gcig pu bong bu'i @226b rnam par bya'am /
analyzed: ci bcom ldan 'das gcig pu bong bu'i @226b rnam par bya'am /
translated: Should only the BhagavƒÅn be made into the form of a donkey,

original: 'on te gzhan yang bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan yang bya zhe na /
translated: or should others also be made so?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
translated: The yoginƒ´s, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: The yoginƒ´ is VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´.

original: de bzhin zhes pa ni ji ltar bong bu'i zhal can yin pa de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma lnga yang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes pa ni ji ltar bong bu'i zhal can yin pa de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma lnga yang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúLikewise‚Äù means just as the donkey-faced one, so also the five yoginƒ´s beginning with VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´. This is the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir 'di rnams de lta bu'i zhal du bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di rnams de lta bu'i zhal du bya zhe na /
translated: Why should these be made into such faces?üîΩIt is said:

original: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The yoginƒ´s, etc.

original: gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i dbang gis gzugs gzhan du bya ba de'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i dbang gis gzugs gzhan du bya ba de'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Because they are to be made into other forms by the power of desire, for that reason, is the intention.

original: mkha' 'gro ma so so'i bye brag gsungs pa /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma so so'i bye brag gsungs pa /
translated: The individual dakinis are taught:

original: bong bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bong bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The donkey-faced and so forth.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is this:

original: bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma lnga po thams cad nyid kyi phyag dang mdog dang dbyibs la sogs pa de ltar gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma lnga po thams cad nyid kyi phyag dang mdog dang dbyibs la sogs pa de ltar gnas so //
translated: The Blessed One and all five yoginis have hands, colors, shapes, and so forth as described.

original: zhal tsam gzhan du'o //
analyzed: zhal tsam gzhan du'o //
translated: The faces are different.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i gri gug yongs su dor te rtse gsum pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ni khyad par ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i gri gug yongs su dor te rtse gsum pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ni khyad par ro zhes pa'o //
translated: The dakinis' flaying knives are discarded, and they are marked with a trident. This is the difference.

original: yang gzhan lha 'di rnams kyi zhal ni man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang gzhan lha 'di rnams kyi zhal ni man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the faces of these deities should be known from the oral tradition.

original: de la 'di'i man ngag ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di'i man ngag ni 'di yin te /
translated: The oral tradition is as follows:

original: thugs kyi 'khor lor ni nam mkha' lding gi zhal lo //üîΩgsung gi 'khor lor gnas pa ni rma bya'i zhal can no //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lor ni nam mkha' lding gi zhal lo // gsung gi 'khor lor gnas pa ni rma bya'i zhal can no //

analyzed: bsam gtan zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMeditation‚Äù is the meditation on the circle of the ma·πá·∏çala, and so forth.

analyzed: mchod pa ni yo byed rnam pa lngas lha la sogs pa mchod pa'o //

analyzed: 'di rnams kyis re zhig sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par bstan te /

analyzed: pho nya mo dang legs par 'dres par 'gyur ba dang bral yang sgrub pa pos 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //

analyzed: @231b 'o na mchod pas ji ltar 'bras bu ster zhe na /
translated: But how does worship bestow the result?

original: mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúWorship, and so forth,‚Äù

original: sgrub pa pos zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
translated: and ‚Äúthe adept‚Äù means the practitioner.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: gsungs pa / 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni pho nya mo dang yang dag par 'dres par gzhan la mchod pas lha mnyes pa'i bdag nyid du rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni pho nya mo dang yang dag par 'dres par gzhan la mchod pas lha mnyes pa'i bdag nyid du rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The verse beginning from this indicates that the deity is pleased by the worship of others who are truly united with the messenger.

original: bstan bcos ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi theg pa chen po sna tshogs su nges pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi theg pa chen po sna tshogs su nges pa yin no //

original: ts'a ru bza' ba rtag tu bya //
analyzed: ts'a ru bza' ba rtag tu bya //
translated: One should always eat caru.

original: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi sogs pa'i ts'a ru bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas rdzogs par bya ste bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi sogs pa'i ts'a ru bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas rdzogs par bya ste bza' bar bya'o //

analyzed: pho nya mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'am gcig tu bza' bar bya'o //

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni nyi ma re re'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni nyi ma re re'o //

original: legs par mnyam pa zhes pa ni bdag med cing mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas brgya la'ang mi 'grub po zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: legs par mnyam pa zhes pa ni bdag med cing mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas brgya la'ang mi 'grub po zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Well-equipoised means that the yogin who is selfless and not in equipoise will not succeed, even in a hundred years. This is the intention.

original: rigs rnams kun las nye bar spyad bya zhing //
analyzed: rigs rnams kun las nye bar spyad bya zhing //

original: zhes pa ni rigs thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs su gyur pa rnams dang lhan cig tu ts'a ru bza' ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs su gyur pa rnams dang lhan cig tu ts'a ru bza' ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that all the clans, which are the clans of Ak·π£hobhya and so forth, are together the ‚Äúcaru oblation.‚Äù

original: bza' ba min par ni mi brtag go zhes pa ni bza' ba dang bza' bar bya ba ma yin par dpyad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bza' ba min par ni mi brtag go zhes pa ni bza' ba dang bza' bar bya ba ma yin par dpyad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not imagine that it is not to be eaten‚Äù means that it should not be analyzed as to whether it is to be eaten or not to be eaten.

original: dbyer med pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i dam tshig bsten pa'i sgrub pa po dang / pho nya dag dbyer med cing bskyod du med par phan gdags par 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dbyer med pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i dam tshig bsten pa'i sgrub pa po dang / pho nya dag dbyer med cing bskyod du med par phan gdags par 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúInseparable‚Äù and so forth means that the practitioner who relies on that commitment, and the messengers, will become inseparable and unshakable, and will be desirous of benefiting each other.

original: gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba las bshad zin to //
analyzed: gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba las bshad zin to //
translated: ‚ÄúTwo‚Äù has been explained in the context of the ‚Äúconnection.‚Äù

original: gang las she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang las she na gsungs pa /

original: dngos grub cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos grub cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: dngos grub gnyis kyi rgyud spyad pa las rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang // dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas gang gi phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub gnyis kyi rgyud spyad pa las rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang // dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas gang gi phyir zhes pa'o //

original: rnal 'byor ma'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa /

analyzed: pho nya yang dag pa bstan pa yin //

original: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bsngags pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bsngags pa yin no //

original: nyid lag gi mtshon cha ni shin tu rno ba yin no //
analyzed: nyid lag gi mtshon cha ni shin tu rno ba yin no //

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ngo bo'i don te zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ngo bo'i don te zhes pa'i don to //

translated: In that, whatever yogin is intent on that nature, in the same way, even in each watch of the day, he should be intent on that meaning.

analyzed: de nyid kyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bsgom par bya ba yin no //

original: zla ba ni byang chub sems so //
analyzed: zla ba ni byang chub sems so //

original: ts'a ru gcig pu za ba nyid //
analyzed: ts'a ru gcig pu za ba nyid //

analyzed: de 'dir bde mchog ni gtsang sbra rnal 'byor mas bsgrub pa de skad cig ces pa dang 'brel to //
translated: That very Cakrasa·πÉvara is connected with in an instant and so on.

analyzed: ji ltar 'grub ce na /

original: gsungs pa bsam gtan tsam mam /
analyzed: gsungs pa bsam gtan tsam mam /

analyzed: pho nya'i mtshan nyid kyi gtsang sbras bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku bsgom pa na zla ba'i ts'a ru bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga bsgoms pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i don to // gtsang sgra 'di dag spyad par bshad //

analyzed: gtsang sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: rgyud so so'i bsod nams mang po gsungs pa /

analyzed: gyur cing ces bya ba lhag ma'o // gnyis med za ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //

analyzed: gsungs pa / sdig pa kun zhes bya @232b ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is stated all sins, etc.üîΩIt is easy to understand.

original: go sla'o // de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ltar mjug thogs su bstan ma thag pa'i rim pas mchod pa dang / ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pas mnyes par bya ste /
analyzed: go sla'o // de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ltar mjug thogs su bstan ma thag pa'i rim pas mchod pa dang / ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pas mnyes par bya ste /
translated: Thus, etc., means that, in this way, immediately after, by the process just explained, one should please the deity with offerings, the feast of caru oblations, etc.

original: gtor ma sbyin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should give the sacrificial cake.

original: 'dir ji ltar sbyin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar sbyin zhe na /
translated: How is it to be given here?üîΩIt is said:

original: rang 'dod ces pa ni rang 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: rang 'dod ces pa ni rang 'dod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs own desire‚Äù is one‚Äôs own wish.

analyzed: yid la 'dod par gyur pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: las rnams la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe yogƒ´‚Äù is the practitioner.

original: tshes gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshes gsungs pa /

translated: ‚ÄúThe dark lunar fortnight, etc.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúThe one who delights in ≈örƒ´ Heruka‚Äù

analyzed: zhes pa ni dpa' bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //

original: bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: bya ba gsungs pa /

analyzed: gtor ma so sor dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The oblations are to be offered individually.

original: 'di ni rim par phye ba nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni rim par phye ba nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /

original: // / mya ngan 'das 'byung zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi gzugs can bde ba chen po ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

original: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //

original: zhes pa ni dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i bdag nyid la phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //

translated: means that if one worships the nature of Sri Heruka Cakrasamvara with the outer and secret offerings, then the hosts of heroes and heroines are also worshipped.

original: zla ba'i 'dus pa legs gnas pa'i //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'dus pa legs gnas pa'i //

analyzed: zhes pa ni zla ba ni byang chub rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems so //

analyzed: srog chags spyi yang spun la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Beings means brothers and so on.

original: yang na bde ba ni @233a * //üîΩmya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bde ba ni @233a * // mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Or, pleasure is nirvana.

original: sdug bsngal ni 'khor ba'i rnam pa'i khyad par te /

analyzed: chos kyi sku'i lus can gyi zhes pa ni don dam par chos kyi sku nyid kyi lus mi'i thod pa 'di la rgyu mtshan cis sun 'byin te /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving a body of the dharmakƒÅya‚Äù means that the body of the ultimate dharmakƒÅya is a human skull-cup. What is the reason for refuting this?

original: shin du dag pa thod pa 'di sun 'byin par ma byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: shin du dag pa thod pa 'di sun 'byin par ma byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not refute this very pure skull-cup.

original: 'di nyid las gsungs pa thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid las gsungs pa thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The garland of skulls, etc. are taught in this very [tantra].

original: bshad pa 'dis kha bskang zhes dka' 'grel las bshad par go bar bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa 'dis kha bskang zhes dka' 'grel las bshad par go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this is explained in the commentary with the words this is supplemented by that explanation.

original: 'di bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la ma yin te /

original: 'on kyang dkyil 'khor ba thams cad la yin par gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang dkyil 'khor ba thams cad la yin par gsungs pa /

original: de ltar cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: dag byed kyi thod pa de 'di 'dra ba nyid dpa' bo rnams la nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: dag byed kyi thod pa de 'di 'dra ba nyid dpa' bo rnams la nye bar mtshon pa ste /

original: dpa' mo la yang ngo //
analyzed: dpa' mo la yang ngo //

analyzed: dpa' 'byung zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i lus can dpa' bo dang 'dra bar mgo bo las 'byung bar zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: tsumbi ka zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: tsumbi ka zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //

original: pha rol gu phyin pa zhes pa ni de nyid khyad par byed do //
analyzed: pha rol gu phyin pa zhes pa ni de nyid khyad par byed do //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ is that very [goddess] distinguished.

original: dbus su zhes pa ni de nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbus su zhes pa ni de nyid stong pa nyid do //

original: dpa' bo kun gyi gnas zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul 'dis dpa' bo'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun gyi gnas zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul 'dis dpa' bo'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The place of all heroes means that by this method of emptiness, it is the place of the heroes.

original: rgyab tu gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba ni rgyab tu shin tu nges par bya ba ste zhes bya ba nges par bstan to //
analyzed: rgyab tu gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba ni rgyab tu shin tu nges par bya ba ste zhes bya ba nges par bstan to //
translated: The phrase request to depart is taught by the words should be done in the back, that is, in the rear.

original: gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni khyad par du gshegs su gsol ba yin no //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni khyad par du gshegs su gsol ba yin no //

original: 'di ni rim par bye ba sum cu so gcig pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni rim par bye ba sum cu so gcig pa'o /

original: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni bza' ba dang bca' ba bsdu pa zhes pa ni bza' bar gyur ba'i lus su gyur pa'i phyug de rnams bza' zhing bca' ba'o //
analyzed: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni bza' ba dang bca' ba bsdu pa zhes pa ni bza' bar gyur ba'i lus su gyur pa'i phyug de rnams bza' zhing bca' ba'o //
translated: Now, in order to collect the food and eatables, the text reads, Then another, and so forth. The food and eatables are the animals that have become the body of the food. One should eat and consume them.

original: de'i don du bsdu ba ni phyugs nyid blang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don du bsdu ba ni phyugs nyid blang ba'o //

original: ci ste de yis cir @235a * //üîΩ'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste de yis cir @235a * // 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: gsungs pa phyugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag nyid dkyil 'khor byas te 'tshe ba med pas phyugs blang ngo //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i cho ga ni bdud rtsi myang ba'o //

original: 'di nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsungs pa /

original: dgug pa ni blang bar bya ba la sogs pa go bar bya'o //
analyzed: dgug pa ni blang bar bya ba la sogs pa go bar bya'o //

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /

analyzed: gsungs pa / sngar bstan rim pa zhes pa ni gsum pa'i don to //

analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i ts'a ru'i bza' ba ji lta bar bsags pa 'tshe ba med pa de'i rigs ni zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: he ru ka'i bya bas ba lta 'am zhes pa ni bod bu'i rnal 'byor gyis skye ba bdun pa blta ba'o //

original: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the ma·πá·∏çala of the accomplishment of power,

analyzed: zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la bza' bar bstan pa yin no //

original: 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni sgrub pa po de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: thug pa btsos la zhes pa'i don to //

original: yi dags kyi me tog gis yang dang par mchod la ra skyes kyi cus lan bdun du spangs pa'i shing aaksha'i bal gyi sdong bu mar khu chen po la thod par sbyar te /

analyzed: dud pa blangs la de yis mig la bskus te /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gan rgyal du bsnyal bar bya'o // phyi nas sha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas sngags pas shar du mngon par phyogs pas de'i snying gar nye bar 'dug ste bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa'i sha chen dang khrag dang tshul bu rnams kyis yongs

original: dur khrod kyi kham phor du'o thug blugs la ngag gis sum bha la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pas @235b sbyin sreg bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi kham phor du'o thug blugs la ngag gis sum bha la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pas @235b sbyin sreg bya ba yin no //

original: 'di thams cad kyang dka' 'grel du go bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di thams cad kyang dka' 'grel du go bar bya'o //

original: de nas ro de langs nas ni //
analyzed: de nas ro de langs nas ni //

original: de langs nas de la sngar bstan pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de langs nas de la sngar bstan pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //

original: sgrub pa po dam pa de'i g-yas ngos su bzhag pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sha chen pos rgyun ma chad par bdug par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa po dam pa de'i g-yas ngos su bzhag pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sha chen pos rgyun ma chad par bdug par bya ba yin no //

original: de ltar nges par byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar nges par byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /

analyzed: steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub //

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: 'khor lo gsum la gnas na de yis 'grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum la gnas na de yis 'grub par 'gyur na /

analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //

original: sgrub thabs gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgrub thabs gzhan gsungs pa /

analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i rjes thogs su de'i steng du thod pa'am rus sbal sgom zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: de yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ltar chog ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pa las dkyil 'khor 'dir dngos grub thob po zhes dgongs pa'o // dus ni rtag tu zhes pa ni mngon sum du'o //
translated: The thus and so on means that one should attain power in this ma·πá·∏çala through meditation just as explained.üîΩThe always means in actuality.

analyzed: dus zhes pa ni thun re re'o //

analyzed: de nas mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: nya ni ro hi ta la sogs pa'o //

original: sha ni ra la sogs pa'i sgra smos pas /
analyzed: sha ni ra la sogs pa'i sgra smos pas /

analyzed: de bzhin du khu ba dang tshod ma yang zhes pa'o //

original: ci nus pas zhes pa ni sbyor tshad kyi tshul dang mthun pa'o //
analyzed: ci nus pas zhes pa ni sbyor tshad kyi tshul dang mthun pa'o //
translated: As much as possible is in accordance with the rule of application.

analyzed: dngos su med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ni dka' 'grel nyid las gsal lo //

analyzed: nub mo ni gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya ba yin par bstan to //
translated: Night is taught to be the activity that must definitely always be done.

original: pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag nyid gcig pu mi za bar 'on kyang rnal 'byor ma pho nya ma la yang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag nyid gcig pu mi za bar 'on kyang rnal 'byor ma pho nya ma la yang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Messenger, etc., means that one should not eat alone, but also offer food and drink, etc., to the yoginƒ´ messenger.

original: phyis ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: phyis ci bya zhe na /

original: gsungs pa / rang gi pang par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pho nya mo yang logs su bzhag la lag pa g-yon pas 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rang gi pang par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pho nya mo yang logs su bzhag la lag pa g-yon pas 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning on one's lap and so on refers to the messenger as well, and to embracing her with one's left hand.

original: dpa' bo gnyis med mchod par bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo gnyis med mchod par bya //

original: zhes pa ni dpa' bor gyur bas bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi don du mchod pa ji lta bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du pho nya mo de la gsang ba'i mchod pa bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dpa' bor gyur bas bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi don du mchod pa ji lta bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du pho nya mo de la gsang ba'i mchod pa bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that just as one worships oneself as the hero for the sake of the nondual gnosis, so one should perform the secret worship of that messenger.

original: ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa pho nya mo bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa pho nya mo bstan pa yin no //

original: de lta'i cho ga zhes pa ni 'dis pho nya ste cho gas rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta'i cho ga zhes pa ni 'dis pho nya ste cho gas rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa zhes pa tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa zhes pa tshig gi lhag ma'o //

original: ci'i don du zhe na /üîΩgsungs pa ; bcings pa legs par grol bar bya //

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /

analyzed: bcings pa ni 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: grol ba ni mchog gi zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: grol ba ni mchog gi zhes dgongs so //

analyzed: ji srid me chu yod par du //

analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /

analyzed: mchod par bya ba la sogs pa ste /
